name: Get Music Recommendations
description:
Get personalized music recommendations based on your favorite tracks, artists, and genres. Discover new music tailored to your taste.

You can:
- Get recommendations based on seed tracks, artists, or genres
- Customize recommendation parameters (tempo, energy, acousticness, etc.)
- Get up to 100 recommendations
- Receive audio feature analysis for each track

Requires Spotify API credentials via OAuth.

** WHEN TO USE **
- User asks for "music recommendations"
- User wants to discover songs similar to their favorites
- User wants new music suggestions
- User wants to explore by genre or artist

** WHEN NOT TO USE **
- User wants to search for specific music (use search_music)
- User wants their listening history (use track_listening_history)
- User wants to play a specific song (use play_track)

** EXAMPLES **

1. Recommendations based on favorite artists:
{
  "seed_artists": ["1 The Weeknd", "5K1ykvn66NonMVlW5B46mK"],
  "limit": 20
}

2. Recommendations based on genres:
{
  "seed_genres": ["pop", "indie", "electronic"],
  "limit": 15
}

3. Recommendations with audio features:
{
  "seed_tracks": ["3n3Ppam7vgaVa1iaRUc9Lp"],
  "target_energy": 0.8,
  "target_danceability": 0.7,
  "limit": 25
}

seed_tracks.description: Array of Spotify track IDs (up to 5)

seed_artists.description: Array of Spotify artist IDs (up to 5)

limit.description: Number of recommendations to return (1-100, default: 20)
